channel.title: XML Historical Foreign Exchange Rates for Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) (8 Jan 2021)
channel.description: XML historical foreign exchange rates for Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) from the Float Rates. Published at 8 Jan 2021.
